holidays.title: National Corn on the Cob Day
King Kamehameha Day
holidays.description: A highly revered leader, Kamehameha is honored each year with numerous celebrations across the Hawaiian islands.

holidays.title: National German Chocolate Cake Day
holidays.description: Featuring rich chocolate layers coated in sweet and nutty frosting — but the dessert isn’t actually German!

holidays.title: National Making Life Beautiful Day
holidays.description: Remove those Snapchat and Instagram filters; see people for their real beauty!

holidays.title: Sant Guru Kabir Jayanti
holidays.description: This national event in India is an opportunity to honor the legacy of this mystic poet.

holidays.title: Say Hi Day
holidays.description: Strangers can become best friends with just one word. So, say hi to someone today.

holidays.title: Yarn Bombing Day
holidays.description: There's no wrong way to make yarn graffiti, so make yours bold and colorful!

holidays.title: Claire Holt’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actress and model is creating a relevant legacy in Hollywood.

holidays.title: Dan Howell’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this multi-talented go-getter, nothing is more satisfactory and fulfilling than a cup of victory.

holidays.title: Flamingo’s Birthday
holidays.description: Flamingo rose to prominence by streaming his Roblox gameplay on his YouTube channel.

holidays.title: Jake Webber’s Birthday
holidays.description: Webber’s humorous way of presenting himself on YouTube continues to earn him accolades!

holidays.title: Kodak Black’s Birthday
holidays.description: To this rapper who, through his music, mirrors the genuine illustrations of life, keep soaring high.

holidays.title: Shia LaBeouf’s Birthday
holidays.description: He came into the game to win, and he lets no opportunity pass him.
